infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Allow Feather access to your contacts to enable you see which of your contacts also uses feather, so you can chat them and perform cash transactions with them
infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: Allow Feather access to your location to find the nearest agent close to you
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: We will use your data to provide a better and personalized ads to you.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We use it to show you nearby users and a map showing some agent locations
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: We use it to show you nearby users and a map showing some agent locations
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: We access your camera to let you customize your user display picture.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: We access your photos to let you customize your user display picture.
